home.intro: We are Nexus Aurora. Our goal is to open source space colonisation. We have dedicated experts from all major industries, starting with aerospace and logistics, all the way down to administration and education. Currently we have already kickstarted 45+ standalone projects. Our top contributors are promoted to team leaders. Come join us, and make a stand for Open Source and Mars. We are Nexus Aurora.

discord.intro: To join the discord server, what you have to do is easy: Private Message SpaceInstructor on Reddit and send him a message about yourself. Be it a sentence, a paragraph or a resume, anythin simple will do. You will not be judged on what you know and don't know or your skills. We just do this to keep creeps out.
